name: Oh Sheep! (itch)
description:
Sheeps are endangered! Bring them to the barn and defend them against the wolves.

*** Controls ***

Arrow keys / WASD - Move the dog

Space bar - Bark (and explode wolves)

*** About***

Game made during the Dog Jam organized by Unicorn Pirates.

Credits:

  • Thomas Foucault
  • Volha Furs
  • Aibike Yessimbekova
